page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE IN CREDENHILL
page.content: THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF CHILDREN PER FAMILY IS 2.4. THERE IS MORE MONEY FOR CARS,VIDEOS,COMPUTERS AND HOLIDAYS _ THINGS PARENTS DID NOT EXPERIENCE { }MOST CHILDREN HAVE PETS DOGS:10 CATS:9 FISH:10 RABBITS:5 BIRDS:3 HAMSTERS:2 GUINEA PIG ,MICE,GERBILS,TORTOISE:1 PEOPLE MOVE FAIRLY OFTEN NO GRAND PARENTS LIVE FAR AWAY. 14 CHILDREN ARE FROM R.A.F. FAMILIES WHO MOVE ALL OVER THE WORLD. TWENTY MUMS WORK, SO TIME TOGETHER IS PRECIOUS. AT CHRISTMAS , FAMILIES GET TOGETHER. GRANDPARENTS COME FOR HOLIDAYS PARENTS BRING UP CHILDREN WITHOUT HELP,BUT MOST R.A.F. CHILDREN GO TO BOARDING SCHOOL EVENTUALLY FOR STABLE EDUCATION
